Uses of Class
org.phantomapi.world.MaterialBlock

  • Packages that use MaterialBlock 
    Package Description
    org.phantomapi.chromatic
    Chomatic blocks which supply face-specific coloring and alpha layering for blending along with what color is seen from a given location
    org.phantomapi.core
    The core set of controllers phantom uses to host the framework
    org.phantomapi.multiblock
    Used for multiblock structures
    org.phantomapi.nms
    NMS wrappers and packet related methods (NMSX)
    org.phantomapi.schematic
    Schematics, Artifacts, Structures.
    org.phantomapi.stack
    Stackapi for using a force-set no cloning system for item stacks and inventories
    org.phantomapi.util
    The most useful package.
    org.phantomapi.world
    World wrappers, async utilities, object representations and so much more.
